H0.text: As at August 2004, who is Englands all time top goalscorer. Michael Owen

H1.text: As at August 2004, who is Englands all time top goalscorer. Gary Lineker

H2.text: As at August 2004, who is Englands all time top goalscorer. Alan Shearer

H3.text: As at August 2004, who is Englands all time top goalscorer. Bobby Charlton

A4.text: he is the league's record goalscorer with 260 goals

A5.text: As of 2022, Harry Kane is England's all-time top goalscorer with 63 goals.

A6.text: As of 2022, Gary Lineker is England's all-time top goalscorer with 48 goals.

A7.text: As of 2022, Alan Shearer is England's all-time top goalscorer with 30 goals.

A8.text: As of 2022, Bobby Charlton is England's all-time top goalscorer with 49 goals.
